website_summaries.verdict: Numerous sleek curves in the design set this faucet apart from other options.
pros: All finish options resist corroding, including brushed nickel, chrome, or oil-rubbed bronze
Curves in the design will give you a traditional style in this Roman faucet design
Swan-like neck in the faucet looks great
Easy installation and compatibility with M-PACT system from Moen
cons: Quality control is questionable during shipping and packaging

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Product' Instructions Could Be a Bit Better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 25 year old brass faucet set. Getting to the valves can be quite a challenge or expensive so most/many people will be just replacing these parts like our old brass trim. You must determine which style valves you have to have everything you need for installation. You may need an adapter kit, which I did. Get the right adapter and understand how to cut the plastic pieces to allow the handles to sit snug to the tub surround surface. If you do that, you will have an attractive installation at a reasonable price. Moen support was helpful in getting the job done correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Engr

customer_reviews.title: Wrong parts provided
customer_reviews.text: I am sure it is a lovely product but received a 'open box' item with missing parts. This was pretty noticeable when I opened the package and the materials were stewn about and smudged with fingerprints. Did not receive the required shanks (Moen 106378) but instead was provided other shanks and miscellaneous parts thrown in by the original purchaser. I wouldn't have given the bad review but this morning I tried to reach out to Moen to rectify and ran into further issues. Support hours stated in instructions state Sat 8 - 6:30. When I called them, the cheerful lady on the recording indicated they were closed on Saturday. So, overall a very bad experience with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet, incomplete parts
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent faucet and appears to be well built. Like others, mine did not include everything neccessary for installation. I replaced a Moen Chateau faucet and needed to buy the Moen 106378 Asceri Stem Extension Kit for the handles to fit. It's around $9 on Amazon. Including the extra kit, it was still $60-100 less than Lowe's and Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: carmen s.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wheres the parts?
customer_reviews.text: The product itself looks great when installed but because others stated that certain parts were missing to install in older Moen applications like mine I went ahead and ordered the 106378 parts kit. Good thing I did because the bag holding the parts I needed to install the valve handles was torn open and the parts were indeed gone along with the faucet indexing pin and the o-ring lube packet. Thank you previous reviewers for saving me alot of trouble. Kind of makes me wonder if there was a factory seal on the box to prevent using products on the shelf for needed parts, if there was it was gone too.
customer_reviews.author: Ken SAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does not come ready to install with all required pieces
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom to help her with a bathroom remodel and she didn't head the warnings. It didn't come with all the necessary pieces. That made it useless as we hired a plumber to install in a very awkward layout and didn't want to pay a second fee for him to come out. Additionally the faucet is very high, much higher than expected and didn't work for our tub.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Requires 1/3/8 middle post.  Mine was only 1 inch so I could only use the handles.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 28 year old Moen faucet I was trying to replace. Unfortunately after removing the old spout, the middle post was only 1 inch above the tub. The new spout requires the post to be 1 3/8 tall I believe, so mine leaked. I wound up getting an old spout off of Ebay so I wouldn't have to rip into the tile and replace the valves. I did use the handles from this after I purchased a separate kit to make the handles work with my 28 year old faucet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: It looks and feels fantastic and the water flows so well through it
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels fantastic and the water flows so well through it. We're so happy we went with this design. The cost of the faucet itself was eclipsed by the need for a custom valve and a plumber but it was all well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: did not fit old Moen valve
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice faucet. Unfortunately it did not fit the existing valve on my tub (a 20-year-old Moen Chateau kit); I found an adapter for the handles, but this new trim requires a longer spout pipe. Even more unfortunately, my contractor didn't discover this until the return window for this item had closed. :-(
customer_reviews.author: pondscum

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL! AVOID THIS PAIN AND BUY SOMETHING ELSE FROM YOUR LOCAL PLUMBING SUPPLY STORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions in the box for this Eva Roman Tub faucet item were from 2005 and no matter how the professional contractor tried to install, the spout swivels, and is not secure. I called Moen and escalated to Supervisor in professional dept. after 2 other reps couldn't help. Supervisor sent adapter kit with posts (but no instructions) and some kind of non-threaded top mounting nuts (that are plastic not brass). Adapter parts don't fit the spout! See images! Moen acknowledges issues with this item, yet parts and instructions don't align!! DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Huge Fan

customer_reviews.title: It's not all in the box...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking that it would be an easy swap for a 25 Yr old moen chateau model...wrong. Box seemed to be opened and missing some instructions / parts list and some items including the Moen 106378 extension Stem kit...other items that I had to buy to make it work is silicone grease, large washer, lock ring and locking metal pin for the middle/main faucet. Cheaper then calling a plumber but took a few trips to the hardware store. Handle and faucet seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Notch yo chez

customer_reviews.title: get the valve too.
customer_reviews.text: Don't forget to order the valve with this. The faucet is perfect for our tub.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hess

customer_reviews.title: Percect fit
customer_reviews.text: Easy conversion from my old handles and spout to the new one....like that Moen makes these cosmetic upgrades so you dont have to pay for the complete set with the valve. It is a beautiful transition.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Froehlich

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for to upgrade the look of my hot tub. Had to purchase the Moen #106378 stem extension due to replacing an older "Chateau" style faucet with newer "Eva" style, but was a simple swap out and fit perfectly..
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: LOve the look of this faucet
customer_reviews.text: LOve the look of this faucet. My plumber told me they didjt come with a pice that fit my old connecter which was weird but it made it work. Just wish it came with other size attachments to attche the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Nyhavn49

customer_reviews.title: High maintenance to keep clean!
customer_reviews.text: They are lovely looking, but spot up from everything and not the situation you want from a faucet.
customer_reviews.author: D0n8life

customer_reviews.title: Looks excellent and for the price you can’t beat it
customer_reviews.text: Looks excellent and for the price you can’t beat it. I’ve seen a lot of other fixtures at Ferguson’s for four times the price that doesn’t even look as nice as this one. The best part is that is can be removed very easily with the Moen 4792 base.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Way to cheap out with a rubber Allen screw plug Moen !
customer_reviews.text: The Eva trim kit is nice but for the money paid and Moen provides a rubber Allen screw plug that does not stay in. Way to cheap out! The older models had plastic plugs that actually stayed in. Makes the final product look like trash
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed- nice product came opened
customer_reviews.text: When this box arrived, it appeared it had been opened and handled. There were fingerprints on the handles and the bag with the parts had been opened. I promptlu repackadged it and sent it back with instructionsthat I wanted a new andunused unit. I ordered another one today. If this one isnt new, Im done. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cherylcs

customer_reviews.title: Easy upgrade to your bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Great item, Bought used from Amazon Warehouse deals. It's a very classic upgrade to our bathtub. Solid and well built. this item fits the "new" style Moen valve. We had to order the Moen Asceri Steam Extinction Kit to get the knobs to fit our older Moen valve.
customer_reviews.author: FredFlintstone

customer_reviews.title: It looks just beautiful and the neck of the spout is high enough ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this assembly with a new jacuzzi tub during a recent bathroom remodel. It looks just beautiful and the neck of the spout is high enough that it does not interfere with getting in and out of the tub. The neck is fairly upright, so we needed to drill holes in the tub and mount directly on the edge rather than n the surrounding tile. But works fine and looks very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product and is an easy upgrade for your old Moen Chateau roman faucet. As other reviewers noted, there was missing pieces in the kit. I ended up having to order the Moen 106378 Asceri Stem Extension Kit. This should have been in the box from my understanding. I spent the extra $10 rather than exchange out the faucet or call Moen. Other than that, it is a easy upgrade that is well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: We had a problem
customer_reviews.text: very nice product but we needed to call Moen for extra parts (they send them for free) The problem was that the handyman had to come a second time. We were replacing a Moen faucet with another one and we did not think that would happen. These were some very inexpensive pieces that probably cost them a dollar and should have been included, considering the cost of the item. Delta products always include extra parts.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a new tub faucet (no name brand) with this Moen. It's heavier, functions substantially better and looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Romano

customer_reviews.title: easy switch with extension kit
customer_reviews.text: had to order the extension kit (Moen 106378 Asceri Stem Extension Kit, 2-Pack) but works great
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L. Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Contemporary but not modern design, I just love it. Just be aware you may need to order a Moen 106378 Asceri Stem Extension Kit, 2-Pack if the stems on your tub are not long enough. I had to use them the set looks wonderful on my roman tub.
customer_reviews.author: Kimer801

customer_reviews.title: Makes tub look new.
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice on my old tub. Makes it look new.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Faucet
customer_reviews.text: If you have older Moen faucets get the conversion kit to make your new faucet installation much easier.
customer_reviews.author: 1skibum

customer_reviews.title: We remodeled our bath and this faucet set looks great. Graceful
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our bath and this faucet set looks great. Graceful, simple lines, subdued burnished metal fits our new style very well.
customer_reviews.author: rcg

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom Remodel
customer_reviews.text: We had the faucet professionally installed. It looks great and we’re confident will stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. But I received it with a vital part missing. I think something goes in that little opening.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Urbina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sink
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and I loved the way it looked. Very elegant looking.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: We love it, it’s beautiful BUT came with faucett and handles only!! Uuuugh! No extenders for the handles! Reeeaally?? A bit irritated!
customer_reviews.author: Eddette Milam

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my sealed box and four of the “Included” parts from the parts list are not in the box. I have a plumber scheduled to come tomorrow to install. First time I’ve had this happen with an Amazon order - not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Owens

customer_reviews.title: Heavy valve set!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about buying this without seeing it in hand first. I made the purchase and am delighted with it. It is sleek and modern. Very heavy cast brass in a great nickel finish. Instalation went easy. This was the first faucet set I have ever installed and it went without a hitch just following the instructions. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and very well made. Moen was great to work with for any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great look and very easy to install. This allows quick filling for a tub.
customer_reviews.author: Axel

customer_reviews.title: Came missing pieces, Great look
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and matching Eva faucets and shower trim kit for a bathroom redo. This was the only purchase that was missing pieces (was missing the white plastic insert that goes into the handles). Called Moen's help line and they quickly sent the replacement pieces. However, am unsure if they sent the correct part because we had to trim it down for it to fit. In addition to that, there is a small rubber cap that covers the screw on the back of the faucet that we found impossible to get in. The look of the faucet is great and quite large with a high arc. Matches the other Eva products great. Overall happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes beautiful in our airtub, love the high arch of the faucet and contemporary design! Love Moen products!
customer_reviews.author: rcgoodman

customer_reviews.title: Moen Roman Tub Faucet Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for 16 year old Moen Roman Tub faucet. Fit perfectly on old valve assembly using Moen 106378 Stm Ext. Looks great...works great
customer_reviews.author: Robert F Knoeringer

customer_reviews.title: The Price was great exceptional quality
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable product. The Price was great exceptional quality. I'm very happy with my purchase of the Moen two bundle bathtub faucet. I totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because I needed the kit only. I have not yet re-ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Lynetta Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Moen quality at half price from the local store. Very nice lines and aesthetically pleasing for our bathroom remodeling.
customer_reviews.author: Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking fixtures. I did read the reviews prior of purchasing so I also purchased the lavatory valve/drain set as well.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Loop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best looking tub faucet ever. It looks very nice on my Jacuzzi.
customer_reviews.author: kairanni

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for one that would fit my original plumbing. Perfect. Much better price than local stores.
customer_reviews.author: gator aka

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend to anyone who wants to update their older Moen fixtures. Needed the Moen 106378 Asceri Stem Extension Kit, 2-Pack. I purchased that on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the faucet but my plumbing wasn't compatible to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the faucet but my plumbing wasn't compatible to replace what I had. It would have involved removing marble tile to get to the guts to then install. So I will live with the Moen chrome with the gold trim from 2004'
customer_reviews.author: Susanne S Mc

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Look for Soaking Tub
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and elegant with soaking tub. Matches rest of Moen Eva bathroom fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with other Moen products
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with other Moen products. swaped out my old set for these and they look great. I did have to purchase the stem extension kit for the handle to sit flush on my tub
customer_reviews.author: D V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and with new drain updated older roman tub and makes the bath look new
customer_reviews.author: jjs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design
customer_reviews.text: When we put our home on the market, we decided to upgrade the fixtures to Oil rubbed bronze (ORB). This faucet arrived quickly and was packed well. The lines were graceful and the finish was intact.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Skies

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set. Looks elegant on our Roman tub
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. Looks elegant on our Roman tub. Our plumber had to get additional parts (stems?) for the handles even though he was replacing an existing Moen faucet. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality...Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, but missing pieces. So inspect package when received...even if it ships "new".
customer_reviews.author: Arizona CK

customer_reviews.title: If you are changing out older hardware
customer_reviews.text: it does not include the part needed if you have older hardware. Order the part 106473 x2 separate
customer_reviews.author: Techie girl

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution
customer_reviews.text: Did not include the right connectors to install the handles.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Love the streamline look & have a great updated look to my garden tub!😊👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Barb Dockweiler

customer_reviews.title: Nice faucet set.
customer_reviews.text: Solid sturdy heavy. Can't believe it was as cheap as it was.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome water flow. Looks great. Great delivery. Installed it with Moen 4792 valve kit.
customer_reviews.author: CraigV

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This roman tub faucet is very good. It's heavier than expected and looks expensive compared to actual cost. Makes a luxury bath complete.
customer_reviews.author: G A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful... I had to call Moen to get 1 missing piece, but the shipped it to me right away at no cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: crisp updated look for less than a full bath overhaul
customer_reviews.author: Frank G. Risalvato

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Upon initial inspection of product I noticed a damaged o ring. I had to order a new o ring directly from moen.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We love the design and good quality if the faucet. We did need to purchase separately the valve assembly to finish the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The trim kit is beautiful and made our tub look brand new with this simple update. Goes very well with the rest of the EVA line.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Soares

customer_reviews.title: Style and Function
customer_reviews.text: Matches the brushed nickel fixtures in my master bath and has a really rich look. Function is excellent. Plumber installed it for $25 in just minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: The faucet installation was fine. I didn't have any problem
customer_reviews.text: The faucet installation was fine. I didn't have any problem. The finish isn't as good as I thought. Not something I would expect from Moen.

customer_reviews.title: hard to install - need an adapter kit
customer_reviews.text: looks good, but you should make sure you order the adapter kit as it is unlikely to fit without it.

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it does not fit older Moen garden tub valves.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, redid the whole bath with Eva fixtures, lights, faucets, towel bars, they ware very solid and pretty

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We love the product, exactly what we were looking for and matches with other item's we have in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Boschaert

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Seller sent me pictures of the actual product before I bought it. He was very friendly. I am so happy with the quality and condition if this product. I saved so much money and did not sacrifice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Roeder

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't beat the price. Nice quality item. Our plumber had no problems with installation. Would highly recommend but don't forget to buy a new drain cover.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: The plumber just installed the EVA tub faucet and it looks beautiful. Very solid unit which I think will last years.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Seuthe

customer_reviews.title: Moen T943ORB Eva Two-Handle High Arc Roman Tub Faucet and Handles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. High quality. Recommend you consider getting the Moen 106378 Asceri Extension Kit as this was needed to provide the correct length of extensions to connect the new handles to the existing valves. Also don't forget to get the tub drain kit. I ordered the Moen T90331ORB Tub Drain Kit with Push-N-Lock drain. This kit matched perfectly with the faucet color and fit in the existing tub drain holes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Frahm

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great! Only gripe is it doesn't have 'hot' and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great! Only gripe is it doesn't have 'hot' and 'cold' indicators on the knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Ichiban

customer_reviews.title: Great minus the defects...
customer_reviews.text: The faucet looks great and the high arc was perfect for my tub.. However I received two different faucets and both were filled with defects, the "replacement" was worse.. They were both filled with dings and scratches, most definitely NOT worth $200+. I can't believe Moen would ship these to seller as new. So disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: good facet.
customer_reviews.text: the good and bad... the faucet looks nice and met my wife's expectations. the bad news is it did not have the plumbing to go with it!!! I have never purchased something like this before and never would again. if you buy a faucet don't you expect the plumbing to go with it? not with this one.
customer_reviews.author: greg85742

product_meta.title: Moen T943BN Eva Two-Handle Deck Mount Roman Tub Faucet Trim Kit, Valve Required, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description:
Color:Brushed NickelAccent your bathroom with the flowing curves and classic charm of the Moen Eva Two Handle High Arc Roman Tub Faucet without Valve. This faucet features a high arc swan like spout and two convenient petal like lever handles that give you control of water temperature and flow. The faucet is compatible with the Moen M PACT valve system that makes it easy to update your trim kit without touching the plumbing, and features a LifeShine brushed nickel finish that resists flaking and corroding for the lifetime of the faucet. With a transitional design and backed by Moen's Limited Lifetime Warranty, the Moen Eva Two Handle High Arc Roman Tub Faucet adds a classic touch to any three hole bath. *Moen Two Handle Roman Tub Valve sold separately.

AMAZON.COM




Offering an elegant, transitional design that gives today's home timeless appeal, the Moen Eva collection's tapered, sophisticated lines will never go out of style. This high-arc Roman tub faucet in brushed nickel features a two–handle lever design for ease of use and a conventional deck mount design. It is ADA compliant. 



The Eva high-arc Roman tub faucet in brushed nickel (view larger).

Note that this faucet does not include a valve.

LIFESHINE NON-TARNISH FINISH
Moen LifeShine finishes are guaranteed not to tarnish, corrode or flake off for life. Developed exclusively by Moen, in collaboration with NASA Glenn Research Center, the LifeShine finish offers enhanced resistance to abrasion, corrosion, and chemical attack. The LifeShine finish is in the surface--not on it--resulting in color stability for the life of the faucet. The Physical Vapor Deposition (PVD) technique helps to eliminate hazardous by-products during the manufacturing process. 

M–PACT COMMON VALVE SYSTEM
With Moen, changing your bath and shower faucet style is as easy as changing a light bulb. Install any of Moen's M–Pact-compatible faucets once, and you can upgrade the style at any point in the decorating or construction process--or switch style years down the road--without replacing any faucet plumbing. All changes can be made above the deck or in front of the wall.

WARRANTY
This Moen Eva is backed by a limited lifetime warranty against leaks, drips and finish defects to the original consumer purchaser. For commercial installations, it's backed by a 5-year limited warranty.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Moen Eva Roman tub faucet, installation instructions







FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Eva collection offers an elegant, transitional design that gives today's home timeless appeal. With tapered, sophisticated lines, Eva delivers a look that will never go out of style. Valve 4992 not included in this set; see Moen Part Number T943BN-4992 for kit that includes valve.

See more
feature_bullets: WARM AND INVITING: Brushed Nickel finish provides a lightly brushed warm-grey metallic look
VALVE REQUIRED: This trim kit requires valve #4792, 4793, 4794, 4796, 4797, or 4798 to complete installation
LONGSTANDING FLEXIBILITY: Built on the Moen M-PACT common valve system, allowing you to update the faucet style in the future without replacing any plumbing
COORDINATING COLLECTION: Coordinates with other faucets and accessories in the Eva Collection
ADA COMPLIANT: Complies with Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) specifications
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Lifetime Warranty
